import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import UserPage from './UserPage' export default function Users() { const[editProf, setEditProf]=useState(false) const reports=[ { title:'فرهاد زارع', num:'29563', phone:'09104803777', date:'1400/03/01', cost:'5/000/00', }, { title:'فرهاد زارع', num:'29563', phone:'09104803777', date:'1400/03/01', cost:'5/000/00', }, { title:'فرهاد زارع', num:'29563', phone:'09104803777', date:'1400/03/01', cost:'5/000/00', }, { title:'فرهاد زارع', num:'29563', phone:'09104803777', date:'1400/03/01', cost:'5/000/00', }, { title:'فرهاد زارع', num:'29563', phone:'09104803777', date:'1400/03/01', cost:'5/000/00', }, ] const single= ()=>{ setEditProf(!editProf) } return (
{ editProf ? :
{ reports.map((item,i)=>{ return(

{item.title}

{item.num}

{item.phone}

{item.date}

{item.cost}

) }) }
}
) }
